short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Extension that lets you know Oromummaa better, one story at a time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn about your culture, language, heroes, history, and politics. And become more proud of your Oromummaa. Get a random short story every time you open a new tab in your browser.
